troubling."},{"lineNumber":116044,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ケケケ、ユキちゃんキチガイですから、が","translatedEnglishLine":"Hehe, because Yuki-chan is crazy,"},{"lineNumber":116045,"originalJapaneseLine":"　口癖の使徒なんているわけないじゃないですか」","translatedEnglishLine":"there's no way there's an Apostle with a catchphrase like Say it’s a lie—!?"},{"lineNumber":116049,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、やめて下さい、","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, please stop,"},{"lineNumber":116050,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あんまり触られると馬鹿が移っちゃいます」","translatedEnglishLine":"if you touch me too much, stupidity will rub off."},{"lineNumber":116051,"originalJapaneseLine":"「馬鹿ってー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Stupidity!?"},{"lineNumber":116052,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がーん、がーん……","translatedEnglishLine":"Shock, shock..."},{"lineNumber":116053,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私が今まで見ていたユキはいったい……","translatedEnglishLine":"Who exactly was the Yuki I've been seeing all this time...?"},{"lineNumber":116054,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぷっ……","translatedEnglishLine":"Pfft..."},{"lineNumber":116055,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぷぷぷぷ……","translatedEnglishLine":"Hehehe..."},{"lineNumber":116056,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぷふー！　ジョークジョーク☆","translatedEnglishLine":"Phew! Just kidding, just kidding☆"},{"lineNumber":116057,"originalJapaneseLine":"　冗談に決まってるんですけどー！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Of course it’s a joke!?"},{"lineNumber":116058,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ケケケケ、すっかり騙されちゃって！","translatedEnglishLine":"Hehehe, you were completely fooled!"},{"lineNumber":116059,"originalJapaneseLine":"　サイゼル様ったら素直すぎですね！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Saizeru-sama, you’re too trusting!"},{"lineNumber":116060,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え、ジョーク？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Huh, a joke?"},{"lineNumber":116061,"originalJapaneseLine":"「待って、どこから！？","translatedEnglishLine":"Wait, from where!?"},{"lineNumber":116062,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どこからジョーク！？","translatedEnglishLine":"From where was that a joke!?"},{"lineNumber":116063,"originalJapaneseLine":"　株主なのは本当！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Is it true you’re a shareholder!?"},{"lineNumber":116064,"originalJapaneseLine":"「コパンドン会長」","translatedEnglishLine":"Chairman Copandon."},{"lineNumber":116065,"originalJapaneseLine":"「分かっとります。","translatedEnglishLine":"I understand."},{"lineNumber":116066,"originalJapaneseLine":"　うちはなーんも言いません」","translatedEnglishLine":"I won’t say a single word."},{"lineNumber":116067,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あんたはなんでそんなユキに義理堅いの！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Why are you so loyal to someone like that Yuki!?"},{"lineNumber":116068,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほらほら、サイゼル様、","translatedEnglishLine":"Come on, Saizeru-sama,"},{"lineNumber":116069,"originalJapaneseLine":"　イライラには牛乳ですよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"milk is the remedy for irritation."},{"lineNumber":116070,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それはもういい！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Enough of that already!"},{"lineNumber":116071,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いいから、いいからー」","translatedEnglishLine":"It’s fine, it’s fine—"},{"lineNumber":116072,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、くっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, ugh..."},{"lineNumber":116073,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああもう！　よこしなさい！","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, geez! Hand it over!"},{"lineNumber":116074,"originalJapaneseLine":"　飲まないとやってられないわよ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I can’t deal with this without drinking it!"},{"lineNumber":116075,"originalJapaneseLine":"「わーい、サイゼル様が牛乳飲んだー」","translatedEnglishLine":"Yay, Saizeru-sama drank milk!"},{"lineNumber":116076,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんなんだこの会話……」","translatedEnglishLine":"What is this conversation...?"},{"lineNumber":116077,"originalJapaneseLine":"今日もランス城に、ユキの謎がまた一つ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Today once again at Rance Castle, another mystery of Yuki."},{"lineNumber":116078,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しっかし……","translatedEnglishLine":"Still..."},{"lineNumber":116079,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺様もなんだかんだ色んな使徒を見てきたが……","translatedEnglishLine":"I've seen all kinds of Apostles so far..."},{"lineNumber":116080,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Yes?"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人だからって悪いことしていいとお思いで？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Do you think it's okay to do bad things just because you're a demon?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私、そういうの幻滅しちゃうな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I get really disillusioned by that kind of thing.
Your way of speaking is different!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、うちが普段知っとるユキちゃんさんは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, the Yuki-chan I usually know is

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 普段はサイゼル様に合わせてIQ下げてたので
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Normally I lower my IQ to match Saizeru-sama.
Right now my IQ is about 130,
but usually I keep it at 4.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あんた今まで私の前ではキャラ作ってたの！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You've been faking your character in front of me all this time!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケケケ、ユキちゃんキチガイですから、が
口癖の使徒なんているわけないじゃないですか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there's no way there's an Apostle with a catchphrase like that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そりゃ、いるわけないと思ってたけど今更！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I thought there was no way, but now you're telling me!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 嘘でしょ！？　嘘って言ってー！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You’re lying, right!? Say it’s a lie—!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あんまり触られると馬鹿が移っちゃいます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: if you touch me too much, stupidity will rub off.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私が今まで見ていたユキはいったい……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Who exactly was the Yuki I've been seeing all this time...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぷふー！　ジョークジョーク☆
冗談に決まってるんですけどー！？」
「ケケケケ、すっかり騙されちゃって！
サイゼル様ったら素直すぎですね！」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From where was that a joke!?
Is it true you’re a shareholder!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うちはなーんも言いません」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I won’t say a single word.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あんたはなんでそんなユキに義理堅いの！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Why are you so loyal to someone like that Yuki!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: イライラには牛乳ですよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: milk is the remedy for irritation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああもう！　よこしなさい！
飲まないとやってられないわよ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can’t deal with this without drinking it!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わーい、サイゼル様が牛乳飲んだー」
今日もランス城に、ユキの謎がまた一つ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Today once again at Rance Castle, another mystery of Yuki.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様もなんだかんだ色んな使徒を見てきたが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've seen all kinds of Apostles so far...

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Do you think it's okay to do bad things just because you're a demon?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私、そういうの幻滅しちゃうな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I get really disillusioned by that kind of thing.
Your way of speaking is different!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、うちが普段知っとるユキちゃんさんは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, the Yuki-chan I usually know is

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 普段はサイゼル様に合わせてIQ下げてたので
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Normally I lower my IQ to match Saizeru-sama.
Right now my IQ is about 130,
but usually I keep it at 4.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あんた今まで私の前ではキャラ作ってたの！？」

口癖の使徒なんているわけないじゃないですか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there's no way there's an Apostle with a catchphrase like that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そりゃ、いるわけないと思ってたけど今更！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I thought there was no way, but now you're telling me!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 嘘でしょ！？　嘘って言ってー！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You’re lying, right!? Say it’s a lie—!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あんまり触られると馬鹿が移っちゃいます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: if you touch me too much, stupidity will rub off.

サイゼル様ったら素直すぎですね！」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From where was that a joke!?
Is it true you’re a shareholder!?

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I won’t say a single word.

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Why are you so loyal to someone like that Yuki!?

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: milk is the remedy for irritation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああもう！　よこしなさい！
飲まないとやってられないわよ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can’t deal with this without drinking it!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わーい、サイゼル様が牛乳飲んだー」
今日もランス城に、ユキの謎がまた一つ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Today once again at Rance Castle, another mystery of Yuki.
